CN.content:

Paragraph: Such high and balanced hole - electron mobility for the PBDT-TDPP-S is responsible for the high FF level in the devices.

Let's think step by step.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high and balanced hole - electron mobility for the PBDT-TDPP-S is responsible for the high FF level in the devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high and balanced hole - electron mobility |
| FF level |

Please note that "high and balanced hole - electron mobility" is considered as one property name since it is a combined term in the original paragraph. Similarly, "FF level" is also considered as one property name.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high and balanced hole - electron mobility |

"FF level" is not considered as a material property in this context, as it is a performance metric for the device rather than a property of the material itself. Therefore, it has been excluded from the list.

The two "Property Value" entities identified from the paragraph are "high and balanced hole - electron mobility" and "high FF level". These entities are mentioned as the properties that contribute to the high performance of the PBDT-TDPP-S devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

| high and balanced hole - electron mobility |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I have found that only one entity, "high and balanced hole - electron mobility", clearly refers to the value of a material property. The other entity, "high FF level", is a property of the device, but it is not a material property. Therefore, I have removed it from the list of valid entities.
